item.title: The Balayage effect
item.dc:creator: LUXE Concept Salon
item.description:
At Luxe Hair Salon we are experts in the French hair colouring technique known as Balayage, and it is one of our most requested services. What is Balayage? Balayage is a freehand way of colouring the hair. It can be used to replace traditional foil highlights as well as colouring short pixie hair however the […]

item.title: Nanoplasty Hair Straightening Treatment
item.dc:creator: LUXE Concept Salon
item.description:
The new gold standard in hair straightening and restoration has arrived at Luxe: Nanoplasty Hair Straightening Treatment. This innovative, improved Straightening Technology is intended to replace Keratin systems and Permanent Japanese Straighteners, which can be dangerous for both clients and stylists due to the usage of harsh chemicals and damaging to the hair due to […]
